pages.text: The Ancient Necronomicon is written in an ancient ominous text and contains incoherent ramblings about prophesies, necromancy, funerary incantations, and demon resurrection passages.$(br2)You can resurrect souls of the dead by holding $(4)right-click$() in the near vicinity.
Holy books and history texts forget because we know: Souls are recycled in the death and resurrection show.
